definition: exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb

sentences.english: And to show my appreciation, I would like to pay for your first face-lift.
sentences.chinese: 为了表达我的感激，我愿意花钱请你做一次整容。

sentences.english: It is said that one out ten who do face-lifting is man.
sentences.chinese: 据说现在十名整容者中就有一名是男性。

sentences.english: What do you think of people who are addicted to plastic surgery?
sentences.chinese: 你是如何看待那些整容上瘾的人呢？

sentences.english: Wrinkles can also be reduced through blepharoplasty.
sentences.chinese: 皱纹也可以通过眼睑整容术减少。

sentences.english: A man decides to have a facelift for his birthday.
sentences.chinese: 一个男人决定为他的生日做一次整容。

sentences.english: Besides face-lifting, what method can make nose bit taller?
sentences.chinese: 除了整容，有什么方法可以让鼻子高点？

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Young people see cosmetic surgery as the key to wealth and love."They
sentences.chinese: 同时，年轻人把整容看作是财富与爱情的敲门砖。

sentences.english: Venezuela has one of the highest rates of cosmetic surgery in the world.
sentences.chinese: 委内瑞拉是全世界整容手术率最高的国家之一。

sentences.english: We have no money for surgeries.
Tidies up in the medication ingredient has the harm chemical element.
sentences.chinese: 整容的用药成份里有有危害的化学元素。

sentences.english: You look, she that piece of face-lifting 200 face , the leg is so thin that the leg resemble lollipop.
sentences.chinese: 你们看，她那张整容两百次的脸，腿细得像棒棒糖。

sentences.english: Shaving cream, after-shave lotion, or other cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 剃须泡，须后整容水或其他化妆品。

sentences.english: Joshua:I think the follow-up cosmetic surgery and skin grafts may take a lot of time.
sentences.chinese: 我想后续的整容与植皮，绝对会花上不少的时间噢。

sentences.english: In recent days, Qiongshan City to take a major move to prefectural city Fengxiang Road correlation.
sentences.chinese: 连日来，琼山市采取大动作，对府城凤翔路进行整容。

sentences.english: The plastic surgeon undercut the skin of her cheek.
sentences.chinese: 整容外科医生将她的脸皮下部切开。

sentences.english: Is the dispel pouch in face-lifting operation permanent?
sentences.chinese: 整容手术中的祛眼袋是永久性的吗？

definition: abbr. for 微整形[wei1 zheng3 xing2]
shaping/reshaping/plastic surgery or orthopedics (abbr. of 整形外科[zheng3 xing2 wai4 ke1])
non-surgical cosmetic procedure (injection of Botox, hyaluronic acid etc)
(coll.) to look alike/to be a spitting image of
to disfigure/to spoil the beauty of
(Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4])/photoshopped picture
five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
lit. a girl changes eighteen times between childhood and womanhood (idiom)/fig. a young woman is very different from the little girl she once was
